text: Here is your program: e #include <fcntl.h> #include <unistd.h> int main(int argc, char x*argv) { int fd_a = open("hello.txt", O_RDONLY); // = 3 int fd_b = open("hello.txt", O_RDONLY); int fd_c = dup(fd_b); pid_t child_pid = fork(); int fd_d; if (child_pid == @) { // child process only fd_d = open("flag.txt", O_RDONLY); dup2(fd_d, fd_b); } int fd_e = dup(fd_b); int fd_f = open("note.md", O_RDONLY); return 0; }
